coaching.title: What You'll Get During The [Coaching]
coaching.subtitle: First Free 20 minute Coaching Call
coaching.description: Challenge yourself and broaden your horizons. As you grasp the language, you'll feel a surge in confidence, making connections and expressing yourself in new and fulfilling ways.
coaching.highlight: Learning English Online isn't just about words
coaching.highlightSecondary: it's about unlocking doors to new meaningful experiences and relationships.

step1.title: What You'll Do
step1.description: To make the most of our time together, consider jotting down a few points about your language goals and any specific areas you'd like to focus on.
step1.secondaryText: Prepare quiet room where you can concentrate, have a good internet connection and prepare to turn on your camera during the Zoom session.

step2.title: What Happens
step2.description: We'll discuss your language background, goals, and any challenges you might be facing. This is a fantastic opportunity for us to get to know each other better.
step2.secondaryText: I will ask you to share your current comfort level, challenges, and desired outcomes, so we can tailor the coaching to your unique journey.

step3.title: What to Expect
step3.description: Upon deciding to proceed, we'll smoothly transition into the onboarding process, where we'll set the foundation for our collaboration.
step3.secondaryText: This includes signing the contract, tailoring a bespoke coaching plan to your goals, and crafting a convenient schedule that ensures consistent progress toward mastering your desired language skills.

about.paragraph2: I've honed my skills in proofreading and transcription across a spectrum of fieldsâ€” education, local government, health, literature, business, and the environment.
about.paragraph3: Notably, I've lent my voice to professional trilingual voiceovers for telephone systems and videos.
about.paragraph4: With a cross-cultural proficiency gained through experiences spanning Europe, USA, the UK, Middle East, and Asia, I bring a unique perspective to every interaction.

powerfulTools.title: These Powerful Tools Will
powerfulTools.subtitle: Propel Your Learning
powerfulTools.description: I utilize a diverse range of tools to deliver engaging, effective, and personalized learning experiences for my students.
tools: Platforms like Quill and ChatGPT will create tailored exercises that target your specific grammar and vocabulary needs
Diffit will help you with reading passages and comprehension questions
Wordwall and Miro will create dynamic activities, such as matching games and digital brainstorming sessions
With Zoom as primary platform for live classes, you will get AI summaries to measure your progress
Resources like BBC Learning English and IXL will provide reliable, high-quality language content and exercises

neurocoaching.title: Essential Neurocoaching Tools
neurocoaching.subtitle: To Enhance Your Language Skill
neurocoaching.description: I utilize a diverse range of tools to deliver engaging, effective, and personalized learning experiences for my students.

emotional.title: Emotional
emotional.description: Emotionally engaging content activates the brain's reward centers, enhancing learning and memory.
emotional.detail: I will encourage you to discuss topics you're passionate about or use storytelling to make lessons more relatable and impactful

active.title: Active
active.description: Actively recalling information, such as through quizzes or self-explanation, strengthens memory pathways.
active.detail: I will prompt you to summarize stories or explain grammar rules aloud to reinforce what you've learned.

growth.title: Growth
growth.description: Understanding that the brain is adaptable fosters a growth mindset in my students, encouraging them to view challenges as part of the learning process.
growth.detail: As a Coach I will promote this by celebrating your progress, emphasizing that your language skills grow with practice and perseverance.
